name: Lou J. D'IORIO, Appellant v. Frank T. HAZEL, Esquire, District Attorney of Delaware County, and the County of Delaware

judges: Before ROBERTS, C.J., and NIX, LARSEN, FLAHERTY, McDermott, hutchinson and zappala, jj.
parties: Lou J. D’IORIO, Appellant v. Frank T. HAZEL, Esquire, District Attorney of Delaware County, and the County of Delaware.
attorneys: John M. Gallagher, Jr., Media, for appellant.

casebody.head_matter:
466 A.2d 1346
Lou J. D’IORIO, Appellant v. Frank T. HAZEL, Esquire, District Attorney of Delaware County, and the County of Delaware.
Supreme Court of Pennsylvania.
Argued Oct. 26, 1983.
Decided Nov. 4, 1983.
John M. Gallagher, Jr., Media, for appellant.
Robert A. Graci, Sandra L. Elias, Asst. Dist. Attys., Harry J. Bradley, Asst. County Sol., for appellee.
Before ROBERTS, C.J., and NIX, LARSEN, FLAHERTY, McDermott, hutchinson and zappala, jj.
